easy.q: What do you call cheese that isn’t yours?

c: He was outstanding in his field

c: He heard the drinks were on the house

easy.q: What do you call a dad joke at a waterpark?

c: To hide the tears of joy

deep.q: Why did the dad bring string to the waterpark?
Why did the dad name his towel ‘Thunder’?
c: Because it always comes after the rain

c: He didn’t want to make a big splash

deep.q: Why did the dad bring duct tape to the wave pool?

c: So he wouldn’t get lost in the sauce
So he could find the pun zone
So he could navigate the slipstreams

c: In case he stepped up the fun
In case he got cold feet

c: He thought it was a splash performance
